name: ORS MAPPA Stats Report
description:
The report returns a count of all active MAPPA alerts per type and establishment and a number of Prisoners with a MAPP Alert
DQ0031 - v1.0 Last Modified: 18/01/2022

dataset.name: Alerts
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_ALERT_CATEGORY_DESC.DESCRIPTION AS ALERT_CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_CODE, AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DESCRIPTION AS ALERT_DESCRIPTION, (AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_CODE) || '  -  ' || (AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DESCRIPTION) AS ALERT_TYPE_FULL_DESCRIPTION, COUNT(DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) AS COUNT_NOMS_NUMBER FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_ALERT_CATEGORY_DESC, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_ALERTS AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_ALERT_CATEGORY_DESC.DOMAIN = 'ALERT' OR AT_ALERT_CATEGORY_DESC.DOMAIN IS NULL) AND (AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_CODE) AND (AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.PARENT_CODE = AT_ALERT_CATEGORY_DESC.CODE) AND (AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DOMAIN = 'ALERT_CODE' OR AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DOMAIN IS NULL) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_STATUS = 'ACTIVE') AND AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_TYPE = 'P' AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('All') OR 'All' IN ('All')) AND AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID <> 'ZZGHI' AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_))) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_ALERT_CATEGORY_DESC.DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_CODE, AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DESCRIPTION, (AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_CODE) || '  -  ' || (AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DESCRIPTION)), dataset_ AS (SELECT AGY_LOC_ID, DESCRIPTION, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, ALERT_CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION, ALERT_CODE, ALERT_DESCRIPTION, ALERT_TYPE_FULL_DESCRIPTION, COUNT_NOMS_NUMBER FROM dataset_base_)

report.name: Chart of all Prisoners and MAPPA Alerts

errors.error: instance.report[2].specification.template is not one of enum values: list,list-section,list-tab,summary,summary-section,parent-child
instance.report[3].specification.template is not one of enum values: list,list-section,list-tab,summary,summary-section,parent-child
Report Variant 164215.RS does not have corresponding dataset undefined
